original: Udāna 5.5
analyzed: udāna

original: Uposathasutta
analyzed: uposatha sutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati pubbārāme migāramātupāsāde.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati pubbārāme migāra mātu pāsāde

original: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā tadahuposathe bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto nisinno hoti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena bhagavā tadahuposathe bhikkhu saṅgha parivutaḥ nisinnaḥ hoti

original: Atha kho āyasmā ānando abhikkantāya rattiyā, nikkhante paṭhame yāme, uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṁ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha kho āyasmai ānandaḥ abhikkantāya rattiyā nikkhante paṭhame yāme uṭṭhāya āsanā ekasam uttarāsaṅgam karitvā yena bhagavā tena añjalim paṇāmetvā bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “abhikkantā, bhante, ratti; nikkhanto paṭhamo yāmo; ciranisinno bhikkhusaṅgho;
analyzed: abhikkantā bhante ratti nikkhantaḥ paṭhhamaḥ yāmaḥ cira nisinnaḥ bhikkhu saṅgho

original: uddisatu, bhante, bhagavā bhikkhūnaṁ pātimokkhan”ti.
analyzed: uddisatu bhante bhagavā bhikkhūnam pātimokkham ti

original: Evaṁ vutte, bhagavā tuṇhī ahosi.
analyzed: evam vutte bhagavā tuṇhī ahosi

original: Dutiyampi kho āyasmā ānando abhikkantāya rattiyā, nikkhante majjhime yāme, uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṁ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: dutiyam pi kho āyasmai ānandaḥ abhikkantāya rattiyā nikkhante majjhime yāme uṭṭhāya āsanā ekasam uttarāsaṅgam karitvā yena bhagavā tena añjalim paṇāmetvā bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “abhikkantā, bhante, ratti; nikkhanto majjhimo yāmo; ciranisinno bhikkhusaṅgho;
analyzed: abhikkantā bhante ratti nikkhantaḥ majjhimaḥ yāmaḥ cira nisinnaḥ bhikkhu saṅgho

original: uddisatu, bhante, bhagavā bhikkhūnaṁ pātimokkhan”ti.
analyzed: uddisatu bhante bhagavā bhikkhūnam pātimokkham ti

original: Dutiyampi kho bhagavā tuṇhī ahosi.
analyzed: dutiyam pi kho bhagavā tuṇhī ahosi

original: Tatiyampi kho āyasmā ānando abhikkantāya rattiyā, nikkhante pacchime yāme, uddhaste
analyzed: tatiyam pi kho āyasmai ānandaḥ abhikkantāya rattiyā nikkhante pacchime yāme uddhaste

original: aruṇe, nandimukhiyā rattiyā uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā yena bhagavā
analyzed: aruṇe nandimukhiyā rattiyā uṭṭhāya āsanā ekasam uttarāsaṅgam karitvā yena bhagavā

original: tenañjaliṁ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: tena añjalim paṇāmetvā bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “abhikkantā, bhante, ratti; nikkhanto pacchimo yāmo; uddhasto aruṇo; nandimukhī ratti; ciranisinno bhikkhusaṅgho;
analyzed: abhikkantā bhante ratti nikkhantaḥ pacchimaḥ yāmaḥ uddhastaḥ aruṇaḥ nandimukhī ratti cira nisinnaḥ bhikkhu saṅgho

original: uddisatu, bhante, bhagavā bhikkhūnaṁ pātimokkhan”ti.
analyzed: uddisatu bhante bhagavā bhikkhūnam pātimokkham ti

original: “Aparisuddhā, ānanda, parisā”ti.
analyzed: a parisuddhā ānanda parisā ati

original: Atha kho āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa etadahosi:
analyzed: atha khalu āyasmataḥ mahāmoggallānassa etat ahosi

original: “kaṁ nu kho bhagavā puggalaṁ sandhāya evamāha:
analyzed: kam nu khalu bhagavā puggalam sandhāya evam āha

original: ‘aparisuddhā, ānanda, parisā’”ti?
analyzed: a parisuddhā ānanda parisā ati

original: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno sabbāvantaṁ bhikkhusaṅghaṁ cetasā ceto paricca manasākāsi.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallānaḥ sabbāvantam bhikkhu saṅgham cetasā cetaḥ paricca manasā akāsi

original: Addasā kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno taṁ puggalaṁ dussīlaṁ pāpadhammaṁ asuciṁ saṅkassarasamācāraṁ
analyzed: addasā kho āyasmā mahāmoggallānaḥ tam puggalam dussīlam pāpa dhammam asucim saṅkassara samācāra

original: paṭicchannakammantaṁ assamaṇaṁ samaṇapaṭiññaṁ abrahmacāriṁ brahmacāripaṭiññaṁ antopūtiṁ
analyzed: paṭicchanna kammantam a ssamaṇam samaṇa paṭiññam abrahmacārim brahmacāri paṭiññam antopūti

original: avassutaṁ kasambujātaṁ majjhe bhikkhusaṅghassa nisinnaṁ.
analyzed: avassutam kasambujātam majjhe bhikkhu saṅghassa

original: Disvāna uṭṭhāyāsanā yena so puggalo tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā taṁ puggalaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: disvānaḥ uṭṭhāya āsanā yena saḥ puggalaḥ tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā tam puggalam etat avoca

original: “uṭṭhehi, āvuso, diṭṭhosi bhagavatā;
analyzed: uṭṭhehi āvuso diṭṭhaḥ asi bhagavatā

original: natthi te bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ saṁvāso”ti.
analyzed: natthi te bhikkhūhi saddhim sa vāsaḥ ti

original: Evaṁ vutte, so puggalo tuṇhī ahosi.
analyzed: evam vutte saḥ puggalaḥ tuṇhī ahosi

original: Dutiyampi kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno taṁ puggalaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: dutiyam pi kho āyasmai mahāmoggallānaḥ tam puggalam etat avoca

original: “uṭṭhehi, āvuso, diṭṭhosi bhagavatā;
analyzed: uṭṭhehi āvuso diṭṭhaḥ asi bhagavatā

original: natthi te bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ saṁvāso”ti.
analyzed: natthi te bhikkhūhi saddhim sa vāsaḥ ti

original: Dutiyampi kho …pe…
analyzed: dutiyam pi kho pe

original: tatiyampi kho so puggalo tuṇhī ahosi.
analyzed: tatiyam pi kho so puggalo tuṇhī ahosi

original: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno taṁ puggalaṁ bāhāyaṁ gahetvā bahidvārakoṭṭhakā nikkhāmetvā sūcighaṭikaṁ datvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallānaḥ tam puggalam bāhāyam gahetvā bahi dvāra koṭṭhakāḥ nikkhāmetvā sūci ghaṭikam da tvā yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “nikkhāmito, bhante, so puggalo mayā.
analyzed: nikkhāmitaḥ bhante saḥ puggalaḥ mayā

original: Parisuddhā parisā.
analyzed: parisuddhā parisā

original: Uddisatu, bhante, bhagavā bhikkhūnaṁ pātimokkhan”ti.
analyzed: uddisatu bhante bhagavā bhikkhūnam pātimokkham ti

original: “Acchariyaṁ, moggallāna, abbhutaṁ, moggallāna.
analyzed: acchariya moggallāna abbhuta moggallāna

original: Yāva bāhāgahaṇāpi nāma so moghapuriso āgamessatī”ti.
analyzed: yāva nāma saḥ mogha purisaḥ āgamessati iti

original: Atha kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi:
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “na dānāhaṁ, bhikkhave, ito paraṁ uposathaṁ karissāmi, pātimokkhaṁ uddisissāmi.
analyzed: na dāna aha bhikkhave itas param uposatham karissāmi pātimokkham uddisissāmi

original: Tumheva dāni, bhikkhave, ito paraṁ uposathaṁ kareyyātha, pātimokkhaṁ uddiseyyātha.
analyzed: tumhā iva dāni bhikkhave itas param uposatham kareyyātha pātimokkham uddiseyyātha

original: Aṭṭhānametaṁ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṁ tathāgato aparisuddhāya parisāya uposathaṁ kareyya, pātimokkhaṁ uddiseyya.
analyzed: aṭṭhānam eta bhikkhave anavakāsaḥ yam tathāgataḥ a parisuddhāya parisāya uposatham kareyya pātimokkham uddiseyya

original: Aṭṭhime, bhikkhave, mahāsamudde acchariyā abbhutā dhammā, ye disvā disvā asurā mahāsamudde abhiramanti.
analyzed: aṭṭhime bhikkhave mahā samudde acchariyāḥ abbhutāḥ dhammāḥ ye disvā disvā asurāḥ mahā samudde abhiramanti

original: Katame aṭṭha?
analyzed: katame aṭṭha

original: Mahāsamuddo, bhikkhave, anupubbaninno anupubbapoṇo anupubbapabbhāro, na āyatakeneva papāto.
analyzed: mahā samuddaḥ bhikkhave anupubba ninnaḥ anupubba poṇaḥ anupubba pabbhāraḥ na āyatakena iva papātaḥ

original: Yampi, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo anupubbaninno anupubbapoṇo anupubbapabbhāro na āyatakeneva papāto;
analyzed: yam pi bhikkhave mahā samuddaḥ anupubba ninnaḥ anupubba poṇaḥ anupubba pabbhāraḥ na āyatakena iva papātaḥ

original: ayaṁ, bhikkhave, mahāsamudde paṭhamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, yaṁ disvā disvā asurā mahāsamudde abhiramanti.
analyzed: bhikkhave mahā samudde paṭhamaḥ acchariyaḥ abbhutaḥ dhammaḥ yam disvā disvā asurāḥ mahā samudde abhiramanti

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo ṭhitadhammo velaṁ nātivattati.
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave mahā samuddaḥ ṭhita dhammaḥ velam na ativattati

original: Yampi, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo ṭhitadhammo velaṁ nātivattati;
analyzed: yam pi bhikkhave mahā samuddaḥ ṭhita dhammaḥ velam na ativattati

original: ayaṁ, bhikkhave, mahāsamudde dutiyo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, yaṁ disvā disvā asurā mahāsamudde abhiramanti.
analyzed: bhikkhave mahā samudde dutiyaḥ acchariyaḥ abbhutaḥ dhammaḥ yam disvā disvā asurāḥ mahā samudde abhiramanti

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo na matena kuṇapena saṁvasati. Yaṁ hoti mahāsamudde mataṁ kuṇapaṁ taṁ khippameva tīraṁ vāheti, thalaṁ ussāreti.
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave mahā samuddaḥ na matena kuṇapena savasati yam hoti mahā samudde matam kuṇapam tam khippam eva tīram vāheti thalam ussāreti

original: Yampi, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo na matena kuṇapena saṁvasati, yaṁ hoti mahāsamudde mataṁ kuṇapaṁ taṁ khippameva tīraṁ vāheti thalaṁ ussāreti;
analyzed: yam pi bhikkhave mahā samuddaḥ na matena kuṇapena savasati yam hoti mahā samudde matam kuṇapam tam khippam eva tīram vāheti thalam ussāreti

original: ayaṁ, bhikkhave, mahāsamudde tatiyo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, yaṁ disvā disvā asurā mahāsamudde abhiramanti.
analyzed: bhikkhave mahā samudde tatiyaḥ acchariyaḥ abbhutaḥ dhammaḥ yam disvā disvā asurāḥ mahā samudde abhiramanti

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, yā kāci mahānadiyo, seyyathidaṁ—gaṅgā yamunā aciravatī sarabhū
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave yā kāci mahā nadiyaḥ sā iyyathidagaṅgā yamunā aciravatī sarabhū

original: mahī, tā mahāsamuddaṁ patvā jahanti purimāni nāmagottāni; ‘mahāsamuddo’tveva saṅkhaṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: mahī tāḥ mahā samuddam patvā jahanti purimāni nāma gottāni mahā samuddaḥ ūtvā iva saṅkham gacchanti

original: Yampi, bhikkhave, yā kāci mahānadiyo, seyyathidaṁ—gaṅgā yamunā aciravatī sarabhū mahī tā mahāsamuddaṁ patvā jahanti purimāni nāmagottāni, ‘mahāsamuddo’tveva saṅkhaṁ gacchanti;
analyzed: yat pi bhikkhave yā kāci mahā nadiyaḥ seyyathīdagaṅgā yamunā aciravatī sarabhū mahī tāḥ mahā samuddam patvā jahanti purimāni nāma gottāni mahā samuddaḥ utvā iva saṅkham gacchanti

original: ayaṁ, bhikkhave, mahāsamudde catuttho acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, yaṁ disvā disvā asurā mahāsamudde abhiramanti.
analyzed: bhikkhave mahā samudde catutthaḥ acchariyaḥ abbhutaḥ dhammaḥ yam disvā disvā asurāḥ mahā samudde abhiramanti

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, yā ca loke savantiyo mahāsamuddaṁ appenti, yā ca antalikkhā dhārā papatanti, na tena mahāsamuddassa ūnattaṁ vā pūrattaṁ vā paññāyati.
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave yā ca loke savantiyaḥ mahā samuddam appenti yāḥ ca antalikkhāḥ dhārāḥ papatanti na tena mahā samuddassa ūnattam vā pūrattam vā paññāyati

original: Yampi, bhikkhave, yā ca loke savantiyo mahāsamuddaṁ appenti, yā ca antalikkhā dhārā papatanti, na tena mahāsamuddassa ūnattaṁ vā pūrattaṁ vā paññāyati;
analyzed: yam pi bhikkhave yāḥ ca loke savantiyaḥ mahā samuddam appenti yāḥ ca antalikkhāḥ dhārāḥ papatanti na tena mahā samuddassa ūnattam vā pūrattam vā paññāyati

original: ayaṁ, bhikkhave, mahāsamudde pañcamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, yaṁ disvā disvā asurā mahāsamudde abhiramanti.
analyzed: bhikkhave mahā samudde pañcamaḥ acchariyaḥ abbhutaḥ dhammaḥ yam disvā disvā asurāḥ mahā samudde abhiramanti

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo ekaraso loṇaraso.
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave mahā samuddaḥ eka rasaḥ loṇa rasaḥ

original: Yampi, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo ekaraso loṇaraso;
analyzed: yam pi bhikkhave mahā samuddaḥ eka rasaḥ loṇa rasaḥ

original: ayaṁ, bhikkhave, mahāsamudde chaṭṭho acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, yaṁ disvā disvā asurā mahāsamudde abhiramanti.
analyzed: bhikkhave mahā samudde chaṭṭhaḥ acchariyaḥ abbhutaḥ dhammaḥ yam disvā disvā asurāḥ mahā samudde abhiramanti

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo bahuratano anekaratano. Tatrimāni ratanāni, seyyathidaṁ—muttā maṇi veḷuriyo saṅkho silā pavāḷaṁ rajataṁ jātarūpaṁ lohitaṅgo masāragallaṁ.
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave mahā samuddaḥ bahu ratanaḥ aneka ratanaḥ tatra imāni ratanāni seyyathīdam uttā maṇi veḷuriyaḥ saṅkhaḥ silā pavāḷam rajatam jātarūpam lohitaṅgaḥ masāragalla

original: Yampi, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo bahuratano anekaratano, tatrimāni ratanāni, seyyathidaṁ—muttā maṇi veḷuriyo saṅkho silā pavāḷaṁ rajataṁ jātarūpaṁ lohitaṅgo masāragallaṁ;
analyzed: yam pi bhikkhave mahā samuddaḥ bahu ratanaḥ aneka ratanaḥ tatra imāni ratanāni seyyathīdam uttā maṇi veḷuriyaḥ saṅkhaḥ silā pavāḷam rajatam jātarūpam lohitaṅgaḥ masāragalla

original: ayaṁ, bhikkhave, mahāsamudde sattamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, yaṁ disvā disvā asurā mahāsamudde abhiramanti.
analyzed: bhikkhave mahā samudde sattamaḥ acchariyaḥ abbhutaḥ dhammaḥ yam disvā disvā asurāḥ mahā samudde abhiramanti

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo mahataṁ bhūtānaṁ āvāso. Tatrime bhūtā—timi timiṅgalo
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave mahā samuddaḥ mahatam bhūtānam āvāsaḥ tatrime timiṅgalaḥ

original: timitimiṅgalo asurā nāgā gandhabbā. Santi mahāsamudde yojanasatikāpi attabhāvā, dviyojanasatikāpi
analyzed: timitimiṅgalaḥ asurāḥ nāgāḥ gandhabbāḥ santi mahā samudde yojana satikā api attabhāvāḥ dvi yojana satikā api

original: attabhāvā, tiyojanasatikāpi attabhāvā, catuyojanasatikāpi attabhāvā, pañcayojanasatikāpi attabhāvā.
analyzed: attabhāvā ti yojana satikā api attabhāvā catu yojana satikā api attabhāvā pañca yojana satikā api attabhāvā

original: Yampi, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo mahataṁ bhūtānaṁ āvāso, tatrime bhūtā—timi timiṅgalo
analyzed: yam pi bhikkhave mahā samuddaḥ mahatam bhūtānam āvāsaḥ tatrime timiṅgalaḥ

original: timitimiṅgalo asurā nāgā gandhabbā, santi mahāsamudde yojanasatikāpi attabhāvā dviyojanasatikāpi
analyzed: timitimiṅgalaḥ asurāḥ nāgāḥ gandhabbāḥ santi mahā samudde yojana satikā api attabhāvāḥ dvi yojana satikā api

original: attabhāvā …pe… pañcayojanasatikāpi attabhāvā;
analyzed: atta bhāvā pe pañca yojana satikā api atta bhāvā

original: ayaṁ, bhikkhave, mahāsamudde aṭṭhamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, yaṁ disvā disvā asurā mahāsamudde abhiramanti.
analyzed: bhikkhave mahā samudde aṭṭhamaḥ acchariyaḥ abbhutaḥ dhammaḥ yam disvā disvā asurāḥ mahā samudde abhiramanti

original: Ime kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭha mahāsamudde acchariyā abbhutā dhammā ye disvā disvā asurā mahāsamudde abhiramanti.
analyzed: ime kho bhikkhave aṭṭha mahā samudde acchariyāḥ abbhutāḥ dhammāḥ ye disvā disvā asurāḥ mahā samudde abhiramanti

original: Evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, imasmiṁ dhammavinaye aṭṭha acchariyā abbhutā dhammā, ye disvā disvā bhikkhū imasmiṁ dhammavinaye abhiramanti.
analyzed: evam evam kho bhikkhave imasmin dhamma vinaye aṭṭha acchariyāḥ abbhutāḥ dhammāḥ ye disvā disvā bhikkhū imasmin dhamma vinaye abhiramanti

original: Katame aṭṭha?
analyzed: katame aṭṭha

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo anupubbaninno anupubbapoṇo anupubbapabbhāro, na āyatakeneva papāto;
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave mahā samuddaḥ anupubba ninnaḥ anupubba poṇaḥ anupubba pabbhāraḥ na āyatakena iva papātaḥ

original: evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, imasmiṁ dhammavinaye anupubbasikkhā anupubbakiriyā anupubbapaṭipadā, na āyatakeneva aññāpaṭivedho.
analyzed: evam evam kho bhikkhave imasmin dhamma vinaye anupubba sikkhā anupubba kiriyā anupubba paṭipadā na āyatakena iva aññā paṭivedhaḥ

original: Yampi, bhikkhave, imasmiṁ dhammavinaye anupubbasikkhā anupubbakiriyā anupubbapaṭipadā, na āyatakeneva aññāpaṭivedho;
analyzed: yam pi bhikkhave imasmin dhamma vinaye anupubba sikkhā anupubba kiriyā anupubba paṭipadā na āyatakena iva aññā paṭivedhaḥ

original: ayaṁ, bhikkhave, imasmiṁ dhammavinaye paṭhamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, yaṁ disvā disvā bhikkhū imasmiṁ dhammavinaye abhiramanti.
analyzed: bhikkhave imasmin dhamma vinaye paṭhamaḥ acchariyaḥ abbhutaḥ dhammaḥ yam disvā disvā bhikkhū imasmin dhamma vinaye abhiramanti

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo ṭhitadhammo velaṁ nātivattati;
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave mahā samuddaḥ ṭhita dhammaḥ velam na ativattati

original: evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, yaṁ mayā sāvakānaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ taṁ mama sāvakā jīvitahetupi nātikkamanti.
analyzed: evam evam kho bhikkhave yam mayā sāvakānam sikkhāpadam paññattam tam mama sāvakāḥ jīvita hetu pi na atikkamanti

original: Yampi, bhikkhave, mayā sāvakānaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ taṁ mama sāvakā jīvitahetupi nātikkamanti;
analyzed: yam pi bhikkhave mayā sāvakānam sikkhāpadam paññattam tam mama sāvakāḥ jīvita hetu pi na atikkamanti

original: ayaṁ, bhikkhave, imasmiṁ dhammavinaye dutiyo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, yaṁ disvā disvā bhikkhū imasmiṁ dhammavinaye abhiramanti.
analyzed: bhikkhave imasmin dhamma vinaye dutiyaḥ acchariyaḥ abbhutaḥ dhammaḥ yam disvā disvā bhikkhū imasmin dhamma vinaye abhiramanti

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo na matena kuṇapena saṁvasati; yaṁ hoti mahāsamudde mataṁ kuṇapaṁ taṁ khippameva tīraṁ vāheti, thalaṁ ussāreti;
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave mahā samuddaḥ na matena kuṇapena savasati yam hoti mahā samudde matam kuṇapam tam khippam eva tīram vāheti thalam ussāreti

original: evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, yo so puggalo dussīlo pāpadhammo asuci saṅkassarasamācāro
analyzed: evam evam kho bhikkhave yaḥ saḥ puggalaḥ dussīlaḥ pāpa dhammaḥ asuci saṅkassara samācāraḥ

original: paṭicchannakammanto assamaṇo samaṇapaṭiñño abrahmacārī brahmacāripaṭiñño antopūti
analyzed: paṭicchanna kammantaḥ a ssamaṇaḥ samaṇa paṭiññaḥ a brahmacārī brahmacāri paṭiññaḥ antopūti

original: avassuto kasambujāto, na tena saṅgho saṁvasati; atha kho naṁ khippameva sannipatitvā
analyzed: avassutaḥ kasambujātaḥ na tena saṅghaḥ savasati atha kho nam khippam eva sannipatitvā

original: ukkhipati. Kiñcāpi so hoti majjhe bhikkhusaṅghassa nisinno, atha kho so ārakāva saṅghamhā, saṅgho ca tena.
analyzed: ukkhipati kiñcā api so hoti majjhe bhikkhu saṅghassa nisinnaḥ atha kho saḥ ārakāva saṅghamhā saṅghaḥ ca tena

original: Yampi, bhikkhave, yo so puggalo dussīlo pāpadhammo asuci saṅkassarasamācāro paṭicchannakammanto
analyzed: yam pi bhikkhave yaḥ saḥ puggalaḥ dussīlaḥ pāpa dhammaḥ asuci saṅkassara samācāraḥ paṭicchanna kammanto

original: assamaṇo samaṇapaṭiñño abrahmacārī brahmacāripaṭiñño antopūti avassuto kasambujāto,
analyzed: a ssamaṇaḥ samaṇa paṭiññaḥ a brahmacārī brahmacāri paṭiññaḥ antopūti avassutaḥ kasambu jātaḥ

original: na tena saṅgho saṁvasati; khippameva naṁ sannipatitvā ukkhipati. Kiñcāpi so hoti
analyzed: na tena saṅghaḥ savasati khippam eva nam sannipatitvā ukkhipati kiñca api saḥ hoti

original: majjhe bhikkhusaṅghassa nisinno, atha kho so ārakāva saṅghamhā, saṅgho ca tena;
analyzed: majjhe bhikkhu saṅghassa nisinnaḥ atha kho saḥ ārakāva saṅghamhā saṅghaḥ ca tena

original: ayaṁ, bhikkhave, imasmiṁ dhammavinaye tatiyo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, yaṁ disvā disvā bhikkhū imasmiṁ dhammavinaye abhiramanti.
analyzed: bhikkhave imasmin dhamma vinaye tatiyaḥ acchariyaḥ abbhutaḥ dhammaḥ yam disvā disvā bhikkhū imasmin dhamma vinaye abhiramanti

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, yā kāci mahānadiyo, seyyathidaṁ—gaṅgā yamunā aciravatī sarabhū mahī tā mahāsamuddaṁ patvā jahanti purimāni nāmagottāni, ‘mahāsamuddo’tveva saṅkhaṁ gacchanti;
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave yā kāci mahā nadiyaḥ seyyathā idagaṅgā yamunā aciravatī sarabhū mahī tāḥ mahā samuddam patvā jahanti purimāni nāma gottāni mahā samuddaḥ utvā iva saṅkham gacchanti

original: evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, cattāro vaṇṇā—khattiyā, brāhmaṇā, vessā, suddā te tathāgatappavedite
analyzed: evam evam kho bhikkhave cattāraḥ vaṇṇākhattiyāḥ brāhmaṇāḥ vessāḥ suddāḥ te tathāgata ppavedite

original: dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajitvā jahanti purimāni nāmagottāni, ‘samaṇā
analyzed: dhamma vinaye agārasmaā anagāriyam pabbajitvā jahanti purimāni nāma gottāni samaṇā

original: sakyaputtiyā’tveva saṅkhaṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: sakya puttiyāḥ tu eva saṅkham gacchanti

original: Yampi, bhikkhave, cattāro vaṇṇā—khattiyā, brāhmaṇā, vessā, suddā te tathāgatappavedite
analyzed: yam pi bhikkhave cattāro vaṇṇākhattiyāḥ brāhmaṇāḥ vessāḥ suddāḥ te tathāgata ppavedite

original: dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajitvā jahanti purimāni nāmagottāni, ‘samaṇā
analyzed: dhamma vinaye agārasmaā anagāriyam pabbajitvā jahanti purimāni nāma gottāni samaṇā

original: sakyaputtiyā’tveva saṅkhaṁ gacchanti;
analyzed: sakya puttiyāḥ tu eva saṅkham gacchanti

original: ayaṁ, bhikkhave, imasmiṁ dhammavinaye catuttho acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, yaṁ disvā disvā bhikkhū imasmiṁ dhammavinaye abhiramanti.
analyzed: aya bhikkhave imasmin dhamma vinaye catutthaḥ acchariyaḥ abbhutaḥ dhammaḥ yam disvā disvā bhikkhū imasmin dhamma vinaye abhiramanti

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, yā ca loke savantiyo mahāsamuddaṁ appenti, yā ca antalikkhā dhārā papatanti, na tena mahāsamuddassa ūnattaṁ vā pūrattaṁ vā paññāyati;
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave yāḥ ca loke savantiyaḥ mahā samuddam appenti yāḥ ca antalikkhāḥ dhārāḥ papatanti na tena mahā samuddassa ūnattam vā pūrattam vā paññāyati

original: evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bahū cepi bhikkhū anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyanti, na tena nibbānadhātuyā ūnattaṁ vā pūrattaṁ vā paññāyati.
analyzed: evam evam kho bhikkhave bahū ce api bhikkhū anupādisesāya nibbāna dhātuyā parinibbāyanti na tena nibbāna dhātuyāḥ ūnattam vā pūrattam vā paññāyati

original: Yampi, bhikkhave, bahū cepi bhikkhū anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyanti, na tena nibbānadhātuyā ūnattaṁ vā pūrattaṁ vā paññāyati;
analyzed: yam pi bhikkhave bahū ce ipi bhikkhū anupādisesāya nibbāna dhātuyā parinibbāyanti na tena nibbāna dhātuyāḥ ūnattam vā pūrattam vā paññāyati

original: ayaṁ, bhikkhave, imasmiṁ dhammavinaye pañcamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, yaṁ disvā disvā bhikkhū imasmiṁ dhammavinaye abhiramanti.
analyzed: bhikkhave imasmin dhamma vinaye pañcamaḥ acchariyaḥ abbhutaḥ dhammaḥ yam disvā disvā bhikkhū imasmin dhamma vinaye abhiramanti

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo ekaraso loṇaraso;
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave mahā samuddaḥ eka rasaḥ loṇa rasaḥ

original: evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, ayaṁ dhammavinayo ekaraso vimuttiraso.
analyzed: evam evam kho bhikkhave ayam dhamma vinayaḥ eka rasaḥ vimutti rasaḥ

original: Yampi, bhikkhave, ayaṁ dhammavinayo ekaraso vimuttiraso;
analyzed: yam pi bhikkhave ayam dhamma vinayaḥ eka rasaḥ vimutti rasaḥ

original: ayaṁ, bhikkhave, imasmiṁ dhammavinaye chaṭṭho acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, yaṁ disvā disvā bhikkhū imasmiṁ dhammavinaye abhiramanti.
analyzed: bhikkhave imasmin dhamma vinaye chaṭṭhaḥ acchariyaḥ abbhutaḥ dhammaḥ yam disvā disvā bhikkhū imasmin dhamma vinaye abhiramanti

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo bahuratano anekaratano, tatrimāni ratanāni, seyyathidaṁ—muttā maṇi veḷuriyo saṅkho silā pavāḷaṁ rajataṁ jātarūpaṁ lohitaṅgo masāragallaṁ;
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave mahā samuddaḥ bahu ratanaḥ aneka ratanaḥ tatra imāni ratanāni seyyathīdam uttā maṇi veḷuriyaḥ saṅkhaḥ silā pavāḷam rajatam jātarūpam lohitaṅgaḥ masāragalla

original: evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, ayaṁ dhammavinayo bahuratano anekaratano; tatrimāni ratanāni,
analyzed: evam evam kho bhikkhave ayam dhamma vinayaḥ bahu ratanaḥ aneka ratanaḥ ratanāni

original: seyyathidaṁ—cattāro satipaṭṭhānā, cattāro sammappadhānā, cattāro iddhipādā, pañcindriyāni,
analyzed: seyyathida cattāro sati paṭṭhānā cattāro sammappadhānā cattāro iddhipādā pañca indriyāni

original: pañca balāni, satta bojjhaṅgā, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo.
analyzed: pañca balāni satta bojjhaṅgāḥ ariyaḥ aṭṭhaṅgikaḥ maggo

original: Yampi, bhikkhave, ayaṁ dhammavinayo bahuratano anekaratano, tatrimāni ratanāni, seyyathidaṁ—cattāro
analyzed: yam pi bhikkhave ayam dhamma vinayaḥ bahu ratanaḥ aneka ratanaḥ tatra imāni ratanāni

original: satipaṭṭhānā, cattāro sammappadhānā, cattāro iddhipādā, pañcindriyāni, pañca balāni,
analyzed: sati paṭṭhānā cattāro sammappadhānā cattāro iddhipādā pañca indriyāni pañca balāni

original: satta bojjhaṅgā, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo;
analyzed: satta bojjhaṅgāḥ ariyaḥ aṭṭhaṅgikaḥ maggo

original: ayaṁ, bhikkhave, imasmiṁ dhammavinaye sattamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, yaṁ disvā disvā bhikkhū imasmiṁ dhammavinaye abhiramanti.
analyzed: bhikkhave imasmin dhamma vinaye sattamaḥ acchariyaḥ abbhutaḥ dhammaḥ yam disvā disvā bhikkhū imasmin dhamma vinaye abhiramanti

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo mahataṁ bhūtānaṁ āvāso, tatrime bhūtā—timi timiṅgalo
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave mahā samuddaḥ mahatam bhūtānam āvāsaḥ timiṅgalaḥ

original: timitimiṅgalo asurā nāgā gandhabbā, santi mahāsamudde yojanasatikāpi attabhāvā dviyojanasatikāpi
analyzed: timitimiṅgalaḥ asurāḥ nāgāḥ gandhabbāḥ santi mahā samudde yojana satikā api attabhāvāḥ dvi yojana satikā api

original: attabhāvā tiyojanasatikāpi attabhāvā catuyojanasatikāpi attabhāvā pañcayojanasatikāpi attabhāvā;
analyzed: attabhāvā ti yojana satikā api attabhāvā catu yojana satikā api attabhāvā pañca yojana satikā api attabhāvā

original: evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, ayaṁ dhammavinayo mahataṁ bhūtānaṁ āvāso;tatrime bhūtā—sotāpanno,
analyzed: evam evam kho bhikkhave ayam dhamma vinayaḥ mahatam bhūtānam bhūtāsotāpanno

original: sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno, sakadāgāmī, sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya
analyzed: sotāpatti phala sacchikiriyāya paṭipannaḥ sakadāgāmī sakadāgāmi phala sacchikiriyāya

original: paṭipanno, anāgāmī, anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno, arahā, arahattāya paṭipanno.
analyzed: paṭipannaḥ anāgāmī anāgāmi phala sacchikiriyāya paṭipannaḥ arahā arahattāya paṭipannaḥ

original: Yampi, bhikkhave, ayaṁ dhammavinayo mahataṁ bhūtānaṁ āvāso, tatrime bhūtā—sotāpanno,
analyzed: yam pi bhikkhave ayam dhamma vinayaḥ mahatam bhūtānam āvāso tatra ime bhūtāsa utāpannaḥ

original: sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno, sakadāgāmī, sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya
analyzed: sotāpatti phala sacchikiriyāya paṭipannaḥ sakadāgāmī sakadāgāmi phala sacchikiriyāya

original: paṭipanno, anāgāmī, anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno, arahā, arahattāya paṭipanno;
analyzed: paṭipannaḥ anāgāmī anāgāmi phala sacchikiriyāya paṭipannaḥ arahā arahattāya paṭipannaḥ

original: ayaṁ, bhikkhave, imasmiṁ dhammavinaye aṭṭhamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, yaṁ disvā disvā bhikkhū imasmiṁ dhammavinaye abhiramanti.
analyzed: bhikkhave imasmin dhamma vinaye aṭṭhamaḥ acchariyaḥ abbhutaḥ dhammaḥ yam disvā disvā bhikkhū imasmin dhamma vinaye abhiramanti

original: Ime kho, bhikkhave, imasmiṁ dhammavinaye aṭṭha acchariyā abbhutā dhammā, ye disvā disvā bhikkhū imasmiṁ dhammavinaye abhiramantī”ti.
analyzed: ime kho bhikkhave imasmin dhamma vinaye aṭṭha acchariyāḥ abbhutāḥ dhammāḥ ye disvā disvā bhikkhū imasmin dhamma vinaye abhiramanti iti

original: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṁ viditvā tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā etam attham viditvā tāyam velāyam imam udānam udānesi

original: “Channamativassati,
analyzed: channam ativassati

original: vivaṭaṁ nātivassati;
analyzed: vivaṭam na ativassati

original: Tasmā channaṁ vivaretha,
analyzed: tasmai channam vivaretha

original: evaṁ taṁ nātivassatī”ti.
analyzed: evam tam na ativassati iti

original: Pañcamaṁ.
analyzed: pañcama
